INSERT INTO EAP_USER ( ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, COMPANY, SEX, AGE, WECHAT_ID, SUBSCRIBE_COUNT, EVALUATING_COUNT, SRC, openid, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, DELETED ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluatingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_EAP_USER.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE EAP_USER
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WECHAT_ID = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBSCRIBE_COUNT = #{subscribeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EVALUATING_COUNT = #{evaluatingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SRC = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
